Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI provided me instant feedback on a problem I was currently experiencing, allowing me to continue to work without having to stop and come back later after asking the question is say a tutorial or ed discussion board. I only have used this for programming and it was very helpful but for any math's questions I have its useless. My teachers feedback is similarly instant (in tutorials) and usually similarly effective at solving my problem, usually a bit better than AI (more personalized to my lack of understanding as apposed to a blanket explanation of the topic).

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really, maybe just impressed that AI can so quicky generate a response to my question.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The feedback from AI is faster than my teacher but again a broader explanation instead of a specific explanation of the part I am stuck on from my tutors.
